Page.SpeakText: Welcome to our self-service dinner reservation system.
First we need to know how many people will be on this reservation. Please enter the number of people on your telephone keypad.

InvalidInputEvent.SpeakText: I'm sorry but I didn't understand how many people you entered. Let's try it again.

Page.SpeakText: Okay, for what day would you like this reservation?
Please enter a date with a two digit month, two digit day, and 4 digit year.

InvalidInputEvent.SpeakText: I'm sorry but I don't recognize your input as a valid date. Let's try it again.

Page.IfCondition: Hmmm. The date your entered appears to be in the past. Let's try again. new Date() > new Date("#Month#/#Day#/#Year#")

Page.SpeakText: Alright. For what time would you like to make this reservation?
Please enter a one or two digit hour, followed by a two digit minute.

InvalidInputEvent.SpeakText: That doesn't appear to be a valid time. Let's try again.

Page.IfCondition: I'm sorry, but we are not open at this time. Let's try another time. #Hour# < 5 || #Hour# > 10

Page.SpeakText: Okay. Before we continue, let's make sure I heard you correctly.
You are requesting a reservation for
If this is correct, please press 1. If this is not correct, please press 2.

DTMFEvent.SpeakText: Okay, let's try your reservation again.

Page.SpeakText: Hmmm. I'm sorry, but it appears that we don't have availability at the time you requested.
But we should be able to accomodate you at #ReservationTime#
If it will, please press 1. If it will not, please press 2.

DTMFEvent.SpeakText: Thank you! We will contact you on the day of your reservation to confirm it. We're looking forward to seeing you soon!
I'm sorry we couldn't accomodate you at the time you wanted. Why don't we try to make another reservation.
